other_tests.findings: Mitochondrial A3243G mutation detected, heteroplasmic in mucosa and almost homoplasmic in muscularis mucosae.
Histologic examination showed no mucosal abnormality.
Normal CD4–CD8 ratio with no evidence of any lymphoproliferative disorder.
Decreased platelets without clumping or satellitism.
Platelet count improved to 298.0 x 10^9 cells/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Prednisone was tapered over the next 2 months, and the patient’s platelet count remained normal on follow-up evaluations.
